alert.note: Alert for Cullman; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:45PM CDT until June 25 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR MARSHALL...NORTHEASTERN CULLMAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 345 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Guntersville to near Arab to 7 miles east of Falkville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Albertville, Guntersville, Arab, Grant, Vinemont, Somerville, Baileyton, Eva, Union Grove and Hulaco. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
